text: Ani jevha ibrahima mhanale, he majhya palanakartya! Tu ya thikanala santipurna sahara banava ani ithalya rahivasanna je allaha ani kayamatacya divasavara imana rakhanare asatila, phalanci roji (anna-samagri) pradana kara. Allahane pharmavile ki mi kaphira (inkara karanarya) lokannahi thoda labha pohacavina, maga tyanna agicya azaba (siksa-yatane) kade vivasa karuna takina. Pohacanyace mothe va'ita thikana ahe he
